title: Woman Judge Alleges Sexual Harassment, Appeals To CJI For Permission To End Life In A Letter
selftext:
UP Judge News: In Uttar Pradesh, a young woman judicial officer has penned an open letter to the Chief Justice of India, accusing her senior of sexual harassment during her previous posting. The letter, which has gone viral on social media, reveals the officer's distress, expressing a lack of hope for a fair inquiry or justice.

The two-page letter details the officer's initial enthusiasm upon joining the judicial service, only to endure severe abuse and harassment. She describes being treated like "an unwanted insect" and expresses disappointment that her complaints were not taken as the "cardinal truth."
